original_text: Then Abraham prayed to God, and God healed Abimelek, his wife and his female slaves so they could have children again,
korean_text: 아브라함이 하나님께 기도하매 하나님이 아비멜렉과 그의 아내와 여종을 치료하사 출산하게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: his wife and his female slaves
so they could have children again
sentences.korean_translation: 다시 아이를 가질 수 있도록 하셨습니다
